io.spine.server.bus

Interface BusFilter<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandScheduler, ExecutorCommandScheduler

    @SPI
 @FunctionalInterface
public interface BusFilter<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The filter for the messages posted to a bus.

    A bus may have several filters which can prevent a message from being posted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Ack> accept(E envelope)
      Accepts or rejects a passed message.
      default void close()

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Ack> accept(E envelope)
        Accepts or rejects a passed message.

        A filter can:

        • accept the message (by returning Optional.empty();
        • reject the message with Error status, for example, if it fails to pass the validation;
        • reject the message with OK status. For example, a scheduled command may not pass a filter.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope with the message to filter
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if the message passes the filter, posting result with either status otherwise

      • close

        default void close()
            throws java.lang.Exception

        By default, performs no action.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
